verbose_text: The in vitro biochemical assays show that Gd@C 82 (OH) 22 downregulates various pro angiogenic factors such as matrix metalloproteinases MMP-2/-9 XREF_BIBR, which are used to breakdown the ECM and thus promote the metastasis of cancers XREF_BIBR.
evidence: Gd@C 82 (OH) 22  downregulates various pro-angiogenic factors such as matrix metalloproteinases MMP-2/-9 XREF_BIBR , which are used to breakdown the ECM and thus promote the metastasis
